detail_desc: Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Blouse in a softly draping weave. V-neck opening with ties at the front, gathered shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Two pairs with an all-over print and one with scalloped hems.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail at the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Puff pants in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and narrow elastication and overlocked frill trim around the legs.
Puff pants in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and narrow elastication and overlocked frill trim around the legs.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in sturdy cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Patch front pockets, a yoke with a hanger at the back and long sleeves with gathers at the cuffs.
Short coat in woven fabric with no buttons. Side pockets with decorative flaps and a detachable belt with D-rings at the waist. Lined.
Reversible bucket hat in cotton twill with one patterned side, and one side in a solid colour with a small appliqué on the brim. Width of brim 5 cm.
Tie in a herring-bone weave with shimmering stripes. Width 5.5 cm.
Body in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Body in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Skater skirt in stretch organic cotton jersey with visible elastication at the waist.

Set with a sleeveless blouse, pair of puff pants and a hairband in a cotton weave. Blouse with a double layer at the top and shoulder straps with a decorative bow. Puff pants with covered elastication at the waist and around the legs. Hairband with a decorative bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.

Set with a sleeveless blouse, pair of puff pants and a hairband in a cotton weave. Blouse with a double layer at the top and shoulder straps with a decorative bow. Puff pants with covered elastication at the waist and around the legs. Hairband with a decorative bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Calf-length shirt dress in organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable belt with D-rings. Unlined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.

Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Two-button jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Skater skirt in soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an all-over print. Concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed neckline and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
